title: Spectral thing
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                       |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A hideous glowing apparition.***"On the hungry craving wind My Spectre follows thee behind." -William Blake, "Broken Love". ca. 1800. |

**Spectral things** (**spectres**) are the disembodied spirits of slain creatures. As a type of [derived undead](/Derived_undead "Derived undead"), their stats are based on what the monster had in life.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 Identifying Spectral things](#Identifying_Spectral_things)
- [4 See Also](#See_Also)

## Useful Info

Like [zombies](/Zombie "Zombie") and [skeletons](/Skeleton "Skeleton"), spectral things are weaker and stupider than what they were in life.

- **HP:** ([HD](/HD "HD"))d4 + 4\*HD
- **AC:** Original + 2
- **EV:** Original - 5
- **Speed:** Original
- **Melee attacks:** 80% of original
- **Attack flavour:** [Draining](/Drain_experience "Drain experience").
- **Special:** [Flight](/Flight "Flight"), [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"), [insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial"), infinite [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), regenerates normally, cannot traverse stairs

Spectral things are immune to poison, negative energy, torment, and resistant to cold damage. Like all undead, they are vulnerable to [holy](/Holy "Holy").

Spectral things can be created by [Death Channel](/Death_Channel "Death Channel"), or by monsters' [Spectral Cloud](/Spectral_Cloud "Spectral Cloud") spell. [Nergalle](/Nergalle "Nergalle") is capable of summoning spectral orcs, who will often be armed with [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching")-capable polearms. Spectres can also be found in a few [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Strategy

The main appeal of spectres is that [Death Channel](/Death_Channel "Death Channel") does not consume a monster's body, so it works with any other undead-creating spell. You cannot combine [Animate Dead](/Animate_Dead "Animate Dead") with [Simulacrum](/Simulacrum "Simulacrum"), but you can combine Death Channel with Animate Dead, or Death Channel and Simulacrum.

Spectres are not especially strong compared to zombies or simulacrum, but their draining can be useful. Also, see invisible and flight can occasionally help.

## Identifying Spectral things

Though spectral things will have different stats depending on what they were made from, *Crawl* currently tends to lump them together, making identification somewhat difficult. In console mode, there are unique tiles for several categories of monster, but there are still possible variations within those categories. Press **x** and highlight the spectral thing in question to get a better idea of the monster you are dealing with.

Below are all the categories of spectral things in tiles mode:

[![Bat spectral.png](/images/1/1a/Bat_spectral.png)](/File:Bat_spectral.png) [Bats](/Bat "Bat")

[![Spectral centaur.png](/images/9/93/Spectral_centaur.png)](/File:Spectral_centaur.png) [Centaurs](/List_of_centaurs "List of centaurs")

[![Spectral dragon.png](/images/5/5d/Spectral_dragon.png)](/File:Spectral_dragon.png) [Dragons](/List_of_dragons "List of dragons")

[![Spectral drake.png](/images/b/be/Spectral_drake.png)](/File:Spectral_drake.png) Drakes

[![Spectral fish.png](/images/d/d2/Spectral_fish.png)](/File:Spectral_fish.png) Fish

[![Spectral frog.png](/images/7/76/Spectral_frog.png)](/File:Spectral_frog.png) Frogs

[![Spectral small humanoid.png](/images/8/8a/Spectral_small_humanoid.png)](/File:Spectral_small_humanoid.png) Humanoids (small)

[![Spectral large humanoid.png](/images/a/a4/Spectral_large_humanoid.png)](/File:Spectral_large_humanoid.png) Humanoids (large)

[![Spectral hydra 1.png](/images/b/b5/Spectral_hydra_1.png)](/File:Spectral_hydra_1.png) [![Spectral hydra 2.png](/images/8/87/Spectral_hydra_2.png)](/File:Spectral_hydra_2.png) [![Spectral hydra 3.png](/images/d/d5/Spectral_hydra_3.png)](/File:Spectral_hydra_3.png) [![Spectral hydra 4.png](/images/2/21/Spectral_hydra_4.png)](/File:Spectral_hydra_4.png) [![Spectral hydra 5.png](/images/0/0e/Spectral_hydra_5.png)](/File:Spectral_hydra_5.png) [Hydra](/Hydra "Hydra")

[![Spectral insect.png](/images/0/00/Spectral_insect.png)](/File:Spectral_insect.png) [Insects](/List_of_arthropods "List of arthropods")

[![Spectral bee.png](/images/0/00/Spectral_bee.png)](/File:Spectral_bee.png) Insects (winged)

[![Spectral kraken.png](/images/7/7a/Spectral_kraken.png)](/File:Spectral_kraken.png) [Krakens](/Kraken "Kraken")

[![Spectral lizard.png](/images/8/8b/Spectral_lizard.png)](/File:Spectral_lizard.png) Lizards

[![Spectral naga.png](/images/1/1a/Spectral_naga.png)](/File:Spectral_naga.png) [Nagas](/List_of_nagas "List of nagas")

[![Spectral small quadruped.png](/images/0/0a/Spectral_small_quadruped.png)](/File:Spectral_small_quadruped.png) Quadrupeds (small)

[![Spectral large quadruped.png](/images/a/a9/Spectral_large_quadruped.png)](/File:Spectral_large_quadruped.png) Quadrupeds (large)

[![Spectral snake.png](/images/e/e2/Spectral_snake.png)](/File:Spectral_snake.png) [Snakes](/List_of_snakes "List of snakes")

[![Spectral spider.png](/images/0/0f/Spectral_spider.png)](/File:Spectral_spider.png) [Spiders](/List_of_arachnids "List of arachnids")

## See Also

- [Derived undead](/Derived_undead "Derived undead")
html:
Spectral thing

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
A hideous glowing apparition.

"On the hungry craving wind
My Spectre follows thee behind."
-William Blake, "Broken Love". ca. 1800.

Spectral things (spectres) are the disembodied spirits of slain creatures. As a type of derived undead, their stats are based on what the monster had in life.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 Identifying Spectral things
  • 4 See Also

Useful Info

Like zombies and skeletons, spectral things are weaker and stupider than what they were in life.

  • HP: (HD)d4 + 4*HD
  • AC: Original + 2
  • EV: Original - 5
  • Speed: Original
  • Melee attacks: 80% of original
  • Attack flavour: Draining.
  • Special: Flight, see invisible, insubstantial, infinite willpower, regenerates normally, cannot traverse stairs

Spectral things are immune to poison, negative energy, torment, and resistant to cold damage. Like all undead, they are vulnerable to holy.

Spectral things can be created by Death Channel, or by monsters' Spectral Cloud spell. Nergalle is capable of summoning spectral orcs, who will often be armed with reaching-capable polearms. Spectres can also be found in a few vaults.

Strategy

The main appeal of spectres is that Death Channel does not consume a monster's body, so it works with any other undead-creating spell. You cannot combine Animate Dead with Simulacrum, but you can combine Death Channel with Animate Dead, or Death Channel and Simulacrum.

Spectres are not especially strong compared to zombies or simulacrum, but their draining can be useful. Also, see invisible and flight can occasionally help.

Identifying Spectral things

Though spectral things will have different stats depending on what they were made from, Crawl currently tends to lump them together, making identification somewhat difficult. In console mode, there are unique tiles for several categories of monster, but there are still possible variations within those categories. Press x and highlight the spectral thing in question to get a better idea of the monster you are dealing with.

Below are all the categories of spectral things in tiles mode:

Bats

Centaurs

Dragons

Drakes

Fish

Frogs

Humanoids (small)

Humanoids (large)

Hydra

Insects

Insects (winged)

Krakens

Lizards

Nagas

Quadrupeds (small)

Quadrupeds (large)

Snakes

Spiders

See Also

  • Derived undead
